dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.description: Overview of your organization's statistics and activity

errors.loadError: Error loading dashboard statistics. Please try again later.

users.title: User Management
users.description: Manage users in your organization. View, edit roles, and delete users.

table.noUsersMatching: No users found matching your search.

actions.selectAll: Select at least one user to activate
actions.selectToDeactivate: Select at least one user to deactivate

export.noDataMessage: There are no users to export.

tooltips.cannotEditInactive: Cannot edit inactive user. Activate user first.

permissions.title: Permissions Matrix
permissions.description: Toggle which permissions apply to Admin and User roles.

confirmDialog.title: Save permission changes?
confirmDialog.description: This will replace role-permission mappings for Admin and User.

projectCreation.title: Project Creation
projectCreation.description: Control who can create new projects in the system.
projectCreation.adminOnlyDescription: Only administrators can create new projects.
projectCreation.allUsersDescription: All authenticated users can create new projects.

application.title: Application Settings
application.timezoneDescription: Default timezone for the application (e.g., UTC, America/New_York)
application.languageDescription: Default language code (e.g., en, fr, es)
application.dateFormatDescription: Default date format (e.g., MM/dd/yyyy, dd/MM/yyyy, yyyy-MM-dd)

security.title: Security Settings
security.tokenExpirationDescription: Duration in minutes before access tokens expire (default: 15 minutes)
security.maxLoginAttemptsDescription: Maximum number of failed login attempts before account lockout
security.sessionDurationDescription: Duration in hours before user session expires

email.title: Email Settings
email.description: Configure email server and notification settings.
email.smtpPasswordDescription: For Gmail, use an App Password instead of your regular password

testEmail.title: Test Email Configuration
testEmail.description: Send a test email to verify your SMTP settings
testEmail.requiredMessage: Please enter an email address or use your account email.
testEmail.errorDetail: Failed to send test email. Please check SMTP configuration.

featureFlags.title: Feature Flags
featureFlags.description: Manage feature flags from the Feature Flags admin page.
featureFlags.usePage: Use the Feature Flags page to manage feature flags.

messages.saveSuccessDetail: All settings have been successfully saved.

auditLogs.title: Audit Logs
auditLogs.description: View system audit logs and track administrative actions.

table.noLogsMatching: No audit logs found matching your search.

export.noDataMessage: There are no audit logs to export.

systemHealth.title: System Health
systemHealth.description: Monitor system resources and service status in real-time.

externalServices.title: External Services
externalServices.description: Status of external services and dependencies

errors.loadError: Error loading system health. Please try again later.

aiGovernance.title: AI Governance
aiGovernance.description: Manage AI usage, quotas, and decisions across all organizations

quotas.description: Manage AI quotas for all organizations. Users can view their personal quota details in

overview.loadError: Failed to load AI governance statistics. Please try again later.

createDialog.title: Create Organization
createDialog.description: Create a new organization. The code must be unique and URL-friendly.
createDialog.name: Name
createDialog.codeHint: Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

deleteDialog.title: Delete Organization
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.warning: ⚠️ Warning: This organization has {count} member(s). You must remove or reassign all members before deleting the organization.
deleteDialog.cannotDeleteMessage: This organization has members. Please remove or reassign all members before deleting.

invite.title: Invite User
invite.description: Send an invitation to a new user. They will receive an email with a link to create their account.
invite.linkExpires: Share this link with the user. It will expire in 72 hours.
invite.emailFailedWarning: ⚠️ The invitation was created but email sending failed
invite.emailFailedMessage: You can manually share the invitation link below with the user.
invite.emailErrorMessage: The invitation was created but email sending failed. You can share the invitation link manually.

edit.title: Edit user
edit.description: Update user details. Changes will be saved immediately.
edit.successDetail: The user has been successfully updated.

delete.title: Deactivate user?
delete.description: This action will deactivate the user account. The user will no longer be able to log in, but this action can be reversed by an administrator.
delete.warningMessage: User "{name}" ({email}) will be deactivated and will no longer be able to log into their account.
delete.reversible: This action is reversible: an administrator can reactivate the account later.

userDetail.title: User Details
userDetail.description: View detailed information about this user

projects.none: This user is not a member of any projects.
